name: Wire Flying Maid
description:
!!! NOTE !!! Full-screen mode will not work properly if the display aspect ratio is not 16:9.

Wire Flying Maid is a 2D action game where a maid flies using wires.

- Use only left and right clicks and mouse wheel
- Hook the wire on the flapping ring and fly in the sky
- Collect rings to unlock 7 maid costumes and 7 wire colors
- Keep flying for high score
